name: Definitions
text:
D.  Public Housing; Liens
Note
  Subpart heading amended by L 1998, c 212, §12.
	    [Section effective until June 30, 2006.  For section effective July 1, 2006, see below.]  The following terms wherever used or referred to in this subpart shall have the following respective meanings, unless a different meaning clearly appears from the context:
	"Public housing project" or "complex" means a housing project directly controlled, owned, developed, or managed by the corporation pursuant to part II, except for subparts F and G.
	"Tenant" includes any person occupying a room, dwelling accommodation, living quarters, or space in any public housing project or complex, under or by virtue of any tenancy, lease, license, or permit under or from the corporation. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 212, §16; am L 2005, c 120, §§5, 14, 28]
	    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The following terms wherever used or referred to in this subpart shall have the following respective meanings, unless a different meaning clearly appears from the context:
	"Public housing project" or "complex" means a housing project directly controlled, owned, developed, or managed by the administration pursuant to part II, except for subparts F and G.
	"Tenant" includes any person occupying a room, dwelling accommodation, living quarters, or space in any public housing project or complex, under or by virtue of any tenancy, lease, license, or permit under or from the administration. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 212, §16; am L 2005, c 120, §§5, 14, 28 and c 196, §26(a)]
